main event: An unidentified flying object was visually observed for 2 minutes on September 8, 1960, in Lorain, Ohio.
interesting points: The sighting lasted 2 minutes, The object was observed at approximately 9:00 PM, The object was reported to hover and then accelerate rapidly out of sight, The observer described the object as round and glowing a bright white-red color, The report includes a detailed technical information sheet though lacks photographs.
witness description: Details not specified in the record card.
